name: Nophex's Molybdenum Crash Helmet
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Action Probability Estimator drops in Sector 13 and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Action Probability Estimator" "257960" #L "Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Helmet" "252005" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Action Probability Estimator + Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Helmet = #L "Nophex's Molybdenum Crash Helmet" "257378" Note: Clan Helmet
